Control Name: 1.6 Ensure that IAM users are not assigned the Service Account User or Service Account Token Creator roles at project level
Control Statement: It is recommended to assign the Service Account User and Service Account Token Creator roles to a user for a specific service account rather than assigning the role to a user at project level.
